descriptors.name: amazon_aws_soc_gatt_server
descriptors.label: Amazon AWS - SoC Bluetooth GATT Server
descriptors.description: This application demonstrates how to use the FreeRTOS Bluetooth Low Energy middleware APIs to create a simple GATT server.
